title: Hour 1 - Andrew Brandt (06-19-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Andrew Brandt (06-19-20)
description:
Jamal Adams has outperformed his contract with the Jets, but they are hesitant to pay him. He now seeks a trade else where. Also Andrew Brandt joins to discuss the NFLs perspective on options to pay players, and notes that from a business aspect, Running Backs are the worst positions to pay.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
